Name: Cafe Pleinzicht
Review Text: Lovely atmosphere, nice beer and a very welcoming fella behind the bar

Name: Cafe Pleinzicht
Review Text: One of the only bars in Amsterdam where you can sit up at the bar and almost immediately start shooting the breeze with the locals. I stayed at this bar for a couple of drinks and some good company. Turns out some of the locals here have great taste in music. Definitely happy to go back to Cage Pleinzicht next time.

Name: Cafe Pleinzicht
Review Text: I've met cool local guy. They were friendly. Beer was good. So... Its ok.

Name: Cafe Pleinzicht
Review Text: Incredibly terrible experience. Have been to this place several times, then show up supporting friends on Pride Day and was asked to leave not only from staff, but customers as well. Very disappointed and would not recommend to anyone wanting the Amsterdam experience.

Name: Cafe Pleinzicht
Review Text: Great Bar but no a Caf√©...

Name: Cafe Pleinzicht
Review Text: Smaller Pub but always a great atmosphere! Bartender always has a great attitude and knows the area, happy to help. Good selection of beers on tap, good selection of bottled beers, and liquors. Definitly one of my go to spots when I am in ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe Pleinzicht
Review Text: An absolute gem of a bar. A welcoming, cozy bar with an attentive, kind staff. Always my home base for a night out in the area.

Name: Cafe Pleinzicht
Review Text: Walked in with pride flags and wasn't allowed to order. They kicked us out saying it was full bc of "corona measures".

Name: Cafe Pleinzicht
Review Text: The best pub in red light district. Come to meet Amsterdam people in pleinzicht!!

Name: Cafe Pleinzicht
Review Text: We loved this place! Nice selection of drinks and great atmosphere. Both bartenders were great when we went (we went everyday we were there). Customers are also a ton of fun. Can‚Äôt wait to come back here when we return

Name: Cafe Pleinzicht
Review Text: Our absolute favorite bar in Amsterdam. Quick service, great location and our bartender Alex (and his wife, Emy) are THE best! Cafe Pleinzicht will always be a must on our Amsterdam vacations!

Name: Cafe Pleinzicht
Review Text: Very unfriendly staff. Coffee was cold and the Beer tasted awful and we had to wait 20 Minutes. There was still lipstick at our Glases. Never again!!!

Name: Cafe Pleinzicht
Review Text: Lovely old Brown caf√© in the old center of Amsterdam. Love to be here, Nice bartender, always good music and great vibe!

Name: Cafe Pleinzicht
Review Text: A wonderful local bar, with no pretensions. The beer is cold, the bar staff are great, and the crowd up for a laugh.

Name: Cafe Pleinzicht
Review Text: Came here first time about 46 years ago when at Nautical School and last time just over a year ago, the pub had not changed too much although the rest of the "hood" had gone really down

Name: Cafe Pleinzicht
Review Text: Went to sit down on the bench outside to find my money to go in to buy a meal, owner came out screaming at me over and over "For customers" causing large groups of people to stop and look at us.  Was highly embarrassed.

Name: Cafe Pleinzicht
Review Text: Love it here, we come each time we visit. Small, cozy, good beer, and friendly staff!

Name: Cafe Pleinzicht
Review Text: Fantastic. I don't speak a word of Dutch but the drinks are flowing, the music is great, and In having a good time!

Name: Cafe Pleinzicht
Review Text: Cool bar....great back round music and Alex the owner a bit of Craig.

Name: Cafe Pleinzicht
Review Text: Fantastic atmosphere, great music, and the owner is an absolute diamond

Name: Cafe Pleinzicht
Review Text: Great place. Really welcoming and with good prices

Name: Cafe Pleinzicht
